name: immich-kiosk
tagline: A read only Immich front end designed for kiosks and shared displays
description: Immich Kiosk is a simplified read only front end for Immich designed for kiosks and shared displays. It focuses on browsing and viewing photos with minimal controls, using Immich as the backend media source.

features.title: Kiosk Mode
features.description: Simplified, read-only interface designed for public or shared displays

features.title: Minimal Controls
features.description: Streamlined UI with only essential navigation for easy viewing

features.title: Immich Backend
features.description: Uses your existing Immich server as the photo source

features.title: Shared Display
features.description: Perfect for waiting rooms, offices, or family common areas

features.title: Touch
features.description: Optimized for touchscreen interaction on tablets and kiosks

features.title: Auto
features.description: Automatically updates to show new photos from Immich

features.title: No Editing
features.description: Read-only access prevents accidental modifications to your library

features.title: Customizable Views
features.description: Configure which albums or photos to display in kiosk mode
